title: 2 Bd, Heat, Hot Water, Parking, Hardwood Floor
posting_body: 2 Bedroom Apt in quiet, well maintained building.
Two minute walk to the MBTA Red Line at Ashmont Station.
The renovated Apartment has a Balcony, Hardwood Flooring and New Appliances.
The Heat, Hot Water and a Parking Space are included in the rental price.
There is a long term, live in maintenance person on the property to assist the residents.
The property is owned by a long term owner.
The majority of the residents have lived in the building 5 or more years.
We are seeking calm, quiet, respectful residents who compliment and add to the buildings peaceful atmosphere.
